data.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
data.meta_description: Head back to Hogwarts and help Harry survive his fraught sixth year in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince for Nintendo DS.
data.text:
Head back to Hogwarts and help Harry survive his fraught sixth year in Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince for Nintendo DS. The magic and mystery of the famous series comes to life in your hands as you immerse yourself in another chapter of the be-spectacled wizard’s thrilling story.

You’ll have to master the art of potion mixing, lead your Quidditch team to victory and cast powerful spells using the unique capabilities of your DS every step of the way. Whether you’re dueling with Death Eaters, waving your wand to make the magic happen, or playing pranks on your enemies, the DS Touch Screen and stylus will let you experience first hand how it feels to be Harry.

And while there’s plenty of fun to be had in and around the corridors of Hogwarts – like challenging others to a game of Gobstones or Wizard Skittles - your ultimate goal of piecing together Voldemort’s past and discovering Malfoy’s many secrets ensures that you never lose sight of Harry’s higher calling.

With magical mini-games to unlock, brand new areas like the Horcrux cave to explore and the ability to interact with all your favourite Harry Potter characters, Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince for Nintendo DS lets you see the world through the spectacles of the world’s most famous wizard!

Experience Harry’s world first hand: casting spells, playing Quidditch and mixing potions on the DS Touch Screen.

Embark on a journey to piece together Voldemort’s past and discover Malfoy’s secrets as the Harry Potter story draws to its conclusion.

Play mini-games like Gobstones, Wizard Skittles and Exploding Snap.
